name: Disarming Assault
summary: You attack with enough force to knock the weapon out of your foe's hands.
description:
You attack with enough force to knock the weapon out of your foe's hands. Make a melee Strike; if you hit, you can attempt an Athletics check to Disarm that foe.Traits

Flourish: Flourish actions are actions that require too much exertion to perform a large number in a row. You can use only 1 action with the flourish trait per turn.

Rage: You must be raging to use abilities with the rage trait, and they end automatically when you stop raging.
